author: eTN Editor
title: Chris Bailey promoted to Chief Operating Officer for Centara Hotels & Resorts
text:
Chris Bailey promoted to Chief Operating Officer for Centara Hotels & Resorts Adv: Chris Bailey Adv: 
BANGKOK, Thailand - Centara Hotels& Resorts, Thailandâ€™s leading hotel group, has announced the promotion of Chris Bailey to Chief Operating Officer from Senior Vice President of Sales and Marketing. Source: Centara Hotels & Resorts
